Add `acl_contract = "registry"` to ss123.toml
Add "private","parity","personal" to rpc users  config

Parity launched with : 
`parity --config users.toml --no-ancient-blocks --private-tx-enabled --author="0xe5a4b6f39b4c3e7203ca8caeecbad58d8f29b046" --engine-signer="0xe5a4b6f39b4c3e7203ca8caeecbad58d8f29b046" --private-signer="0xe5a4b6f39b4c3e7203ca8caeecbad58d8f29b046" --private-validators="0xe5a4b6f39b4c3e7203ca8caeecbad58d8f29b046" --private-account="0xe5a4b6f39b4c3e7203ca8caeecbad58d8f29b046" --private-sstore-url="http://127.0.0.1:8010" --private-passwords alice.pwd --password alice.pwd`


Deploy new contract: 
Contract:
```solidity
pragma solidity ^0.4.11;

contract SSPermissions {
  address alice = 0xe5a4b6f39b4c3e7203ca8caeecbad58d8f29b046;
  address bob = 0xfeacd0d28fd158ba2d3adb6d69d20c723214edc9;

  /// Both Alice and Bob can access the specified document
  function checkPermissions(address user, bytes32 document) constant returns (bool) {
    if (user == alice || user == bob) return true;
    return false;
  }
}
```
Address: `0x7ac9f71b22cc080bb71bf47b402d6ae71d8c2c0c`

Use SimpleRegistry from https://github.com/parity-contracts/name-registry/tree/master/contracts

http://remix.ethereum.org/#optimize=false&version=soljson-v0.4.24+commit.e67f0147.js

Already deployed for us: `0x0000000000000000000000000000000000001337`

Make  Alice a bit richer:
`curl --data '{"method":"personal_sendTransaction","params":[{"from":"0x00a329c0648769a73afac7f9381e08fb43dbea72","to":"0xe5a4b6f39b4c3e7203ca8caeecbad58d8f29b046","value":"0x56BC75E2D60000000000000000"},""],"id":1,"jsonrpc":"2.0"}' -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST localhost:8545`

Verify the balance:
`$ curl --data '{"method":"eth_getBalance","params":["0xe5a4b6f39b4c3e7203ca8caeecbad58d8f29b046"],"id":1,"jsonrpc":"2.0"}' -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST localhost:8545`
`{"jsonrpc":"2.0","result":"0x56bc75e2d5f21f494c589c0000","id":1}`

Click on Fee to see what's the fee and paste the value in value, for me `1000000000000000000`
Keccak256 
`parity tools hash <(echo -n "secretstore_acl_checker")
7942baef32fbbcea49e4e1499add5d45575185dd09e9821cb639a9cd448aaaf1`

Reserve:
- Name: `"0x7942baef32fbbcea49e4e1499add5d45575185dd09e9821cb639a9cd448aaaf1"`
- Key: `"A"`
- Value: `"0x7ac9f71b22cc080bb71bf47b402d6ae71d8c2c0c"`

Check eventually that it worked with getAdress (no need for a value).

What is the Document key id for the contract
$ curl --data '{"method":"private_contractKey","params":["0x7ac9f71b22cc080bb71bf47b402d6ae71d8c2c0c"],"id":1,"jsonrpc":"2.0"}' -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST localhost:8545
{"jsonrpc":"2.0","result":"0x00000000000000000000000074c369bf541131062ad208576e40aa258ff45d41","id":1}

PrivateContractCode: 
```
contract Test1 { bytes32 public x; function setX(bytes32 _x) public { x = _x; } }
```
http://remix.ethereum.org/#optimize=false&version=soljson-v0.4.24+commit.e67f0147.js

Bytecode: ``

Private Contract address: `0xeCD324e91592B8614116775b608B630F1Dc2506A`

```bash
parity tools hash <(echo -n "setX(bytes32)")
bc64b76d46f38211b46cd1a107337ffa1958d706b339b2a10aee4ea3d594b474
```

parity_composeTransaction
```bash
curl --data '{"method":"parity_composeTransaction","params":[{"from":"0xe5a4b6f39b4c3e7203ca8caeecbad58d8f29b046", "data":""}],"id":1,"jsonrpc":"2.0"}' -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST localhost:8545
```

- `0xe5a4b6f39b4..8f29b046`:  Alice's address
- `0x60606040523..9d208029` : The private contractâ€™s code. 

Result:
```json
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": {
    "condition": null,
    "data": "",
    "from": "0xe5a4b6f39b4c3e7203ca8caeecbad58d8f29b046",
    "gas": "0xe57e0",
    "gasPrice": "0x0",
    "nonce": "0x12",
    "to": null,
    "value": "0x0"
  },
  "id": 1
}
```

The resulting transaction must then be signed with the previous values.

personal_signTransaction
```bash
curl --data '{"method":"personal_signTransaction","params":[{"data":"","from":"0xe5a4b6f39b4c3e7203ca8caeecbad58d8f29b046","gas":"0xe57e0","gasPrice":"0x0","nonce":"0x12","to":null,"value":"0x0"},"alicepwd"],"id":1,"jsonrpc":"2.0"}' -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST localhost:8545
```
Result
```json
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": {
    "raw": "",
    "tx": {
      "blockHash": null,
      "blockNumber": null,
      "chainId": "0x11",
      "condition": null,

```
private_sendTransaction

```bash
curl--data '{"method":"private_composeDeploymentTransaction","params":["latest", "", ["0xe5a4b6f39b4c3e7203ca8caeecbad58d8f29b046"], "0x0"],"id":1,"jsonrpc":"2.0"}' - H "Content-Type: application/json" - X POST localhost: 8545 
```

Result
```json
{
    "jsonrpc": "2.0",
    "result": {
        "receipt": {
            "contractAddress": "0xe073b5dd71f31e91993523dc69c3b1dbddcbe048",
            "status": 0,
            "transactionHash": "0x7d78e37e20c58e6089717263b27d22fa8afeef37151465323ec4d8dc79992bfc"
        },
        "transaction": {
            "condition": null,
            "data": "",
            "from": "0xe5a4b6f39b4c3e7203ca8caeecbad58d8f29b046",
            "gas": "0x2b1740",
            "gasPrice": "0x0",
            "nonce": "0x12",
            "to": null,
            "value": "0x0"
        }
    },
    "id": 1
}
```
